meanings.sent1: She cheerleads her friends during tough times.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheerleads the team to victory.
meanings.sent3: He cheerleads for his favorite ice cream flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude cheerleads others to do their best.
meanings.sent5: The coach cheerleads the players with motivational speeches.

meanings.definition: To act as a cheerleader for a sports team
meanings.sent1: The cheer captain cheerleads the squad during games.
meanings.sent2: She cheerleads at every football game.
meanings.sent3: He cheerleads with pom-poms and high kicks.
meanings.sent4: The cheerleader cheerleads the team to the championship.
meanings.sent5: The cheer squad cheerleads with synchronized routines.

meanings.definition: To promote or advocate for something
meanings.sent2: The organization cheerleads for equal rights.
meanings.sent3: He cheerleads for healthy eating habits.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity cheerleads for a charity fundraiser.
meanings.sent5: The politician cheerleads for education reform.
